items.sentence: The police searched Tom\'s house for three hours.
I don\'t think it\'ll be easy for Tom to do that.
I don\'t think it\'ll be easy for you to do that.
I don\'t think it\'ll be hard for Tom to do that.
I think you ought to pay more attention in class.
Tom walked down the path, whistling a happy tune.
Tom wants to know how he can lose weight quickly.
Tom was arrested on suspicion of drunken driving.
Are you seriously thinking about eating all that?
I didn\'t know whether Tom should do that or not.
